General.Name: Banan Real Estate Company SJSC
General.Description: Banan Real Estate Company owns and leases residential and non-residential properties in Saudi Arabia. The company operates and manages hotel apartments; manages real estate on commission basis; and provides real estate registration services. Banan Real Estate Company was founded in 2005 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
